text:
Canada's current reputation is tied to its boasting of securing the most #COVID19 #vaccine doses per capita & taking from #COVAX while also undermining it via bilateral deals. Your plan to "step up" & fix this?
(hint: a timeline for sharing actual doses?) https://t.co/ryDxp0hRJd https://t.co/hJht95F07v https://t.co/BsoIXW4zW4
